headline.main: Force Duo Lose Leadership Roles for Tour Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Force Duo Lose Leadership Roles for Tour Misconduct

docs.snippet: Wallabies outside back Dane Haylett-Petty has apologised for his behaviour while in South Africa with the Western Force after he and prop Pek Cowan were stripped of their leadership roles and fined A$5000 (£2,933) by the Australian Rugby Unio...
docs.lead_paragraph: Wallabies outside back Dane Haylett-Petty has apologised for his behaviour while in South Africa with the Western Force after he and prop Pek Cowan were stripped of their leadership roles and fined A$5000 (£2,933) by the Australian Rugby Union (ARU).

headline.main: Public Schools? To Kansas Conservatives, They’re ‘Government Schools’
headline.print_headline: The Right’s Wording for Public Education in Kansas: ‘Government Schools’

docs.snippet: Even some Republicans are worried that the use of the term portends less support for public education....
docs.abstract: Kansas moderates are alarmed by right-wing references to public schools as 'government schools' amid campaign to wrest control of state's school funding; linguists see semantic shift as latest example in effort by conservatives to advance their policies by co-opting certain words.
docs.lead_paragraph: Even some Republicans are worried that the use of the term portends less support for public education.

headline.main: If a Carrot for Jordan Works, Syrian Refugees Will Stay Put
headline.print_headline: If a Carrot for Jordan Works, Refugees Stay Put

docs.snippet: Jordan agreed to take in thousands of Syrian refugees in return for giant interest-free loans from the World Bank. But is it robbing Peter to pay Paul?...
docs.abstract: Jordan, under deal designed to stem flow of refugees into Europe, is receiving generous loan from World Bank and monetary incentives from European nations in order to issue work permits to growing population of Syrian refugees within country.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Kimberly-Clark Halts Venezuela Operations on Deteriorating Economy
headline.print_headline: Kimberly-Clark Halts Venezuela Operations on Deteriorating Economy

docs.snippet: Personal care products maker Kimberly-Clark Corp. on Saturday said it was halting its Venezuela operations due to the deteriorating economic situation that includes soaring consumer prices and shortages of basic goods....
docs.lead_paragraph: Personal care products maker Kimberly-Clark Corp. on Saturday said it was halting its Venezuela operations due to the deteriorating economic situation that includes soaring consumer prices and shortages of basic goods.
